metadata.name: Feynman Physics Equation Benchmark
metadata.description: 120 equations from Feynman Lectures on Physics for symbolic regression evaluation

equations.name: Einstein Mass-Energy Equivalence
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, simple multiplication and power

equations.name: Newton's Second Law
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Velocity Definition
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single division

equations.name: Power from Force and Velocity
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Work Done by Constant Force
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Linear Momentum
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Kinetic Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, multiplication and power with constant

equations.name: Gravitational Potential Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables but only 2 operators, simple chain of multiplications

equations.name: Electrical Power
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Ohm's Law
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Hooke's Law
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Centripetal Acceleration
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, power and division

equations.name: Torque (Simple)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Density
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single division

equations.name: Frequency from Period
equations.tier_rationale: 1 variable, 1 operator, simple reciprocal

equations.name: Wavelength
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single division

equations.name: Heat Transfer
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables but only 2 operators, chain of multiplications

equations.name: Electric Current
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single division

equations.name: Capacitance Definition
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single division

equations.name: Angular Momentum (Simple)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, single multiplication

equations.name: Kinematic Displacement
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 5 operators, addition of two terms with power

equations.name: Simple Pendulum Period
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 4 operators including sqrt and constant pi

equations.name: Spring Potential Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, multiplication with power and constant

equations.name: Newton's Law of Universal Gravitation
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 4 operators, division with chain of multiplications

equations.name: Escape Velocity
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, sqrt of division and multiplications

equations.name: Capacitor Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, same form as kinetic energy

equations.name: Magnetic Force on Moving Charge
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, chain of multiplications

equations.name: Doppler Effect (Source Moving Away)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, nested division and addition

equations.name: Ideal Gas Law (simplified)
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 3 operators, multiplications and one division

equations.name: Kinematic Velocity
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, addition and multiplication

equations.name: Velocity Squared Kinematic
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, power, addition, and multiplications

equations.name: Inductor Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, same form as kinetic/spring energy

equations.name: Pressure at Depth
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 3 operators, addition and multiplications

equations.name: Rotational Kinetic Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, same quadratic energy form

equations.name: Resistors in Series Power Dissipation
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, power and division

equations.name: Gravitational Acceleration
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, multiplication, power, division

equations.name: Photon Energy
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, but fundamental quantum formula

equations.name: Centripetal Force
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, multiplication, power, division

equations.name: Mass-Spring Oscillation Period
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 4 operators, sqrt and constant pi

equations.name: Buoyancy Force
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, chain of multiplications

equations.name: Wave Speed on String
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, sqrt and division

equations.name: Moment of Inertia (Point Mass)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, multiplication and power

equations.name: Electric Field Strength (Point Charge simplified)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, multiplication, power, division

equations.name: Snell's Law (ratio form)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, includes sin function

equations.name: Thermal Expansion
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, chain of multiplications

equations.name: Coulomb's Law (Full Form)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(q1, q2), mul(4, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, pow(r, 2)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 6 operators, involves division, power, and constant pi

equations.name: Lorentz Force
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 3 operators, combined electric and magnetic forces

equations.name: Gravitational Potential
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, negation, multiplication, division

equations.name: Orbital Velocity
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, sqrt of ratio

equations.name: LC Circuit Resonant Frequency
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 5 operators, nested division, sqrt, and constant pi

equations.name: Parallel Plate Capacitor
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, but fundamental capacitor formula

equations.name: Electric Potential (Point Charge Full)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 5 operators, nested multiplication with constants

equations.name: Magnetic Field of Solenoid
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, but involves permeability constant

equations.name: RLC Impedance
equations.formula_symbolic: sqrt(add(pow(R, 2), pow(sub(mul(omega, L), div(1, mul(omega, C))), 2)))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 8 operators, nested power, subtraction, sqrt

equations.name: Torque on Current Loop
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 5 operators, chain of multiplications with sin

equations.name: Faraday's Law (EMF)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, negation and division

equations.name: Magnetic Flux
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, multiplication with cos

equations.name: Electric Flux (Point Charge)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, Gauss's law fundamental relation

equations.name: Kepler's Third Law
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 7 operators, nested powers and sqrt

equations.name: RC Time Constant Discharge
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 5 operators, exponential decay with negation

equations.name: Simple Harmonic Motion Position
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, cosine of product

equations.name: Damped Harmonic Motion Amplitude
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, exponential decay

equations.name: Resistivity and Resistance
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, multiplication and division

equations.name: Projectile Range
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 5 operators, power, sin, and division

equations.name: Spherical Capacitor
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(4, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, div(mul(a, b), sub(b, a)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 6 operators, multiplication, division, subtraction with pi

equations.name: Lensmaker's Equation (Thin Lens)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 5 operators, nested subtraction and division

equations.name: Gravitational Potential Energy (Two Body)
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 4 operators, negation with division and multiplications

equations.name: Magnetic Force Between Parallel Wires
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(mu_0, mul(I1, mul(I2, L))), mul(mul(2, C1), d))
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 7 operators, chain of multiplications and pi constant

equations.name: Energy Stored in Electric Field
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, energy density with permittivity

equations.name: Energy Stored in Magnetic Field
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 3 operators, power and division with permeability

equations.name: Work by Torque
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, rotational work

equations.name: Intensity of Electromagnetic Wave
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, EM wave energy relation

equations.name: Poynting Vector Magnitude
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, energy flux relation

equations.name: Voltage Divider
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, division with addition in denominator

equations.name: Transformer Voltage Ratio
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, transformer relation

equations.name: Electric Field of Charged Sphere
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(Q, r), mul(4, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, pow(R, 3)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 7 operators, nested multiplications with pi and cube

equations.name: Biot-Savart Law (Magnitude)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(mu_0, mul(I, mul(dl, sin(theta)))), mul(4, mul(C1, pow(r, 2))))
equations.formula_python: mu_0 * I * dl * sin(theta) / (4 * pi * r**2)
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 9 operators, Biot-Savart with sin and 4pi denominator

equations.name: Magnetic Dipole Field (On Axis)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(mu_0, mul(2, m_mag)), mul(4, mul(C1, pow(r, 3))))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 7 operators, inverse cube law with constants

equations.name: Relativistic Kinetic Energy
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(m, mul(pow(c, 2), sub(div(1, sqrt(sub(1, div(pow(v, 2), pow(c, 2))))), 1)))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 10 operators, nested sqrt, powers, subtraction

equations.name: de Broglie Wavelength
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, quantum-classical bridge equation

equations.name: Compton Wavelength Shift
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 6 operators, Compton scattering wavelength

equations.name: Bohr Model Energy Levels
equations.formula_symbolic: neg(div(mul(m_e, pow(mul(q, q), 2)), mul(mul(8, pow(epsilon, 2)), mul(pow(h, 2), pow(n, 2)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 11 operators, deeply nested powers and multiplications

equations.name: Stefan-Boltzmann Radiation Law
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 3 operators, T^4 power law radiation

equations.name: Wien's Displacement Law
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, but foundational blackbody relation

equations.name: Photoelectric Equation
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 2 operators, photoelectric effect with work function

equations.name: Time Dilation
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 6 operators, Lorentz factor with nested operations

equations.name: Length Contraction
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 6 operators, Lorentz contraction

equations.name: Electric Dipole Potential
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(p, cos(theta)), mul(4, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, pow(r, 2)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 8 operators, cos with 4pi epsilon denominator

equations.name: Heisenberg Uncertainty (Energy-Time)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, fundamental quantum uncertainty

equations.name: Cyclotron Frequency
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 5 operators, particle in magnetic field frequency

equations.name: Hall Voltage
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 5 operators, Hall effect relation

equations.name: Relativistic Momentum
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 7 operators, Lorentz factor in momentum

equations.name: Relativistic Doppler Effect
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(f0, sqrt(div(sub(1, div(v, c)), add(1, div(v, c)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 7 operators, relativistic frequency shift

equations.name: Magnetic Field of Current Loop (On Axis)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(mu_0, mul(I, pow(R, 2))), mul(2, pow(add(pow(R, 2), pow(x, 2)), 1.5)))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 9 operators, 3/2 power with sum of squares

equations.name: Rayleigh Scattering Intensity
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(I0, div(pow(add(1, pow(cos(theta), 2)), 1), mul(2, mul(pow(r, 2), pow(div(lambda, mul(2, C1)), 4)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 12 operators, deeply nested with cos^2 and lambda^4

equations.name: Bohr Radius
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(4, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, pow(h_bar, 2)))), mul(m_e, pow(q, 2)))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 8 operators, fundamental atomic scale with powers

equations.name: Rydberg Formula (Frequency)
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(R_inf, mul(c, sub(div(1, pow(n1, 2)), div(1, pow(n2, 2)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 7 operators, spectral line frequencies

equations.name: Electric Dipole Field (Axial)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(2, mul(p, pow(r, neg(3)))), mul(4, mul(C1, epsilon)))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 7 operators, inverse cube dipole field

equations.name: Magnetic Moment of Current Loop
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, magnetic moment with pi

equations.name: Larmor Radiation Power
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(pow(q, 2), pow(a, 2)), mul(6, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, pow(c, 3)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 9 operators, accelerated charge radiation

equations.name: Relativistic Energy-Momentum Relation
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 7 operators, compositional relativistic relation combining momentum and rest energy

equations.name: Compton Scattering (Scattered Photon Energy)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(E_gamma, add(1, mul(div(E_gamma, mul(m_e, pow(c, 2))), sub(1, cos(theta)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 10 operators, compositional Compton formula

equations.name: Rutherford Scattering Cross Section
equations.formula_symbolic: pow(div(mul(Z1, mul(Z2, pow(q, 2))), mul(4, mul(E_k, sin(div(theta, 2))))), 2)
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 10 operators, squared ratio with sin(theta/2)

equations.name: Hydrogen Energy Levels (Full)
equations.formula_symbolic: neg(div(mul(m_e, pow(q, 4)), mul(mul(8, pow(epsilon, 2)), mul(pow(h, 2), pow(n, 2)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 11 operators, full quantum energy level expression

equations.name: Schwarzschild Radius
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, general relativity boundary condition

equations.name: Gravitational Time Dilation
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(t0, sqrt(sub(1, div(mul(2, mul(G, M)), mul(r, pow(c, 2))))))
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 8 operators, GR time dilation near massive body

equations.name: Coupled Oscillator Normal Mode (Symmetric)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 2 operators, but represents normal mode decomposition of coupled system

equations.name: Coupled Oscillator Normal Mode (Antisymmetric)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, antisymmetric normal mode with coupling

equations.name: Electromagnetic Wave E-field Component
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 4 operators, traveling wave solution to Maxwell's equations

equations.name: Planck Radiation Law (Simplified)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(mul(8, C1), mul(h, div(pow(f, 3), pow(c, 3)))), sub(exp(div(mul(h, f), mul(k_B, T))), 1))
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 13 operators, Planck distribution with exponential

equations.name: Relativistic Velocity Addition
equations.formula_symbolic: div(add(u, v), add(1, div(mul(u, v), pow(c, 2))))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 6 operators, special relativity composition of velocities

equations.name: Relativistic Mass-Energy (Total Energy)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 8 operators, total relativistic energy

equations.name: Bremsstrahlung Power (Classical)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(mul(pow(q, 2), pow(a, 2)), mul(6, mul(C1, mul(epsilon, pow(c, 3)))))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 9 operators, classical braking radiation

equations.name: Lorentz Force (Full 3D Component)
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(q, add(E_x, sub(mul(v_y, B_z), mul(v_z, B_y))))
equations.formula_latex: F_x = q(E_x + v_y B_z - v_z B_y)
equations.tier_rationale: 6 variables, 5 operators, full vector cross product component

equations.name: Gravitational Redshift (Wavelength)
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(lambda_0, div(1, sqrt(sub(1, div(mul(2, mul(G, M)), mul(r, pow(c, 2)))))))
equations.tier_rationale: 5 variables, 9 operators, GR photon frequency shift

equations.name: Maxwell-Boltzmann Speed Distribution (Most Probable)
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 4 operators, statistical mechanics speed distribution

equations.name: Two-Slit Interference Intensity
equations.formula_symbolic: mul(4, mul(I0, pow(cos(div(mul(C1, mul(d, sin(theta))), lambda_val)), 2)))
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 9 operators, nested trig with interference pattern

equations.name: Radiation Pressure (Perfect Absorption)
equations.tier_rationale: 2 variables, 1 operator, connects EM energy flux to mechanical pressure

equations.name: Electron Drift Velocity
equations.tier_rationale: 4 variables, 4 operators, microscopic current model

equations.name: Fermi Energy (Free Electron Model)
equations.formula_symbolic: div(pow(h_bar, 2), mul(2, mul(m_e, pow(div(mul(mul(3, pow(C1, 2)), n), 1), 0.6667))))
equations.tier_rationale: 3 variables, 10 operators, condensed matter Fermi level with fractional power
